description:
In the recent years, a new subscription businesses model built around monthly boxes have grown very popular. These monthly boxes contains monthly surprises, allowing curated unique experiences for each customer In return, they offer a stable recurring monthly revenue with relatively little work.

You will learn:

  • How to come up with the perfect idea
  • How to design your box and its content
  • How to get the best deals when sourcing your products
  • How to get the best rates on shipping and deal with the unexpected
  • How to jumpstart your customer acquisition & achieve sustainable growth
  • And more!

You get:

  • Over 2 hours of videos
  • Downloadable transcripts of all courses
  • Downloadable slides of all courses

This course is for you if:

  • You want to start a lifestyle business
  • You want stable & recurring revenue
  • You want to turn your passion into a business
title: Strategies for Establishing Your Own Subscription Business
